name: Oakview Care Center (Sample)
safetyNote: Repeat deficiencies in infection control; staffing levels improved but remain below state average.

name: Bayou Gardens Assisted Living (Sample)
safetyNote: Stable inspection history with no harm-level citations in the past 3 years.

name: Heights Village Memory Care (Sample)
safetyNote: High staff turnover; several complaint investigations but no enforcement actions.

name: Willowbend Rehabilitation & Nursing (Sample)
safetyNote: Recent immediate-jeopardy citation; strong indicators for closer review and follow-up questions.

name: Cypress Lakes Senior Living (Sample)
safetyNote: Good staffing patterns and above-average resident/family satisfaction scores.

name: Magnolia Post-Acute Center (Sample)
safetyNote: Mixed history: strong therapy outcomes but inconsistent CNA staffing levels on weekends.

name: Briarwood Retirement & Assisted Living (Sample)
safetyNote: Well-maintained facility with stable leadership and low complaint volume.

name: Parkview Long-Term Care (Sample)
safetyNote: Multiple harm-level citations in back-to-back inspections; state-directed plan of correction active.
